Summary: triangle bright red lights lasted 1-2 seconds , then went out. No sound whatever. approx 25 mi north of Eugene, Or leading light to the westA
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Junction City
There were no other sightings in Junction City on or around August 20th 2011
divs: sighting detailsat approx 2330 (1130 pm) i looked up and saw three bright round lights in a triangle form roughly 100 ft wide and 50\75 ft east to west. only lasted 1-2 seconds then went out. no sound. it was directly over my head . just happened to look up and saw it. thaught it had to be a ufo always wanted to see one.
